basics.name: Casey Caro
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in Security Science Track at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2026.

education.institution: Theodore Roosevelt High School, Honolulu, HI
summary: High School Diploma, Magnum Cum Laude

work.summary: Developed educational gaming courses at GenG during summer internship in Korea
highlights: Led a project to blend gaming with education, enhancing learning for students
Delivered numeorus large-scale presentations in Hawaii, showcasing the work completed at Gen. G
Providing assistance in event planning and facilitating maintenance

awards.title: CyberCorps Scholarship for Service
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to students pursuing cybersecurity degrees who commit to working in government service upon graduation, supported by the CyberCorps Scholarship for Service program.
